title: Confounding Trade? Cathie Wood Dumps $50M In Nvidia Shares Just 2 Weeks After Major Buy And A Day Ahead Of Earnings
text: Cathie Wood-led Ark Investment Management dumped over 293,000 shares ofÂ NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ: NVDA) on Tuesday via two of the firm's exchange-traded funds.

title: Why Things Are Looking Up for Nvidia Before Earnings
text: Nvidia stock could finally be getting cheap enough to buy again.

title: Wednesday's menu: Nvidia looking to restore balance after trading shock
text: US graphics card maker Nvidia Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) publishes second-quarter earnings after Wednesday's closing bell, though again it has already flagged that quarterly revenue will fall US$1.4bn short of the US$8.1bn guided, as sales of gaming chips weakened. Profit margins are expected to be softer too, hit by a running down of excess inventory, while cost control will also be one of the key issues Wall Street will be watching.

title: NVIDIA (NVDA) Q2 Earnings to Be Hurt by Weak Gaming Chip Demand
text: NVIDIA's (NVDA) second-quarter performance is likely to have been negatively impacted by the weakening demand for its chips used in the gaming end market.

title: 3 Things About Nvidia That Smart Investors Know
text: The graphics specialist remains a solid bet despite near-term headwinds.
